body_html:
Have you tried building a fat library that includes both arm/arm64 binaries? The arm64 binary (which is included in the official release) should provide improved performance on arm64 devices.

bazel build --cxxopt='--std=c++11' -c opt --fat_apk_cpu=arm64-v8a,armeabi-v7a ...
body_text:
Have you tried building a fat library that includes both arm/arm64 binaries? The arm64 binary (which is included in the official release) should provide improved performance on arm64 devices.
bazel build --cxxopt='--std=c++11' -c opt --fat_apk_cpu=arm64-v8a,armeabi-v7a ...
body:
Have you tried building a fat library that includes both arm/arm64 binaries? The arm64 binary (which is included in the official release) should provide improved performance on arm64 devices.

```
bazel build --cxxopt='--std=c++11' -c opt --fat_apk_cpu=arm64-v8a,armeabi-v7a ...
```
